Text:
You are going to waste a lot of time downloading very small sized multiple zips, which in turn are going to be containing one part of a multiple spanned rar. Then you are going to have to unzip/unrar twice for each part, all for the sake of a small pdf.
You don't really save much space, unless you are holding these ebooks on multiple floppy disks! Makes more sense to upload the torrent with the .pdf, .epb word doc etc.
seriously musicproappz you need to get a life
